mapper.sql: Id, OperationName, OperationCode, MenuId, IsDeleted, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifiedOn
mapper.insert:
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into Operations
OperationName,
OperationCode,
MenuId,
IsDeleted,
CreatedBy,

ModifiedOn,
VersionNumber,

mapper.update:
update Operations
OperationName = #{operationname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
OperationCode = #{operationcode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
MenuId = #{menuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
CreatedBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreatedOn = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ModifiedOn = #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VersionNumber = #{versionnumber,jdbcType=BINARY},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
